modName: Categorized Favorites Menu - Immersive Mods Config
summary: A config file for Categorized Favorites Menu to support a variety of lore-safe immersive mods.
descriptionHtml:
-- I will no longer be updating this config since SkyUI has its own configuration-free favorites menu now --

I finally got fed up with all the out-of-date CFM configs out there and decided to make my own to support the mods I use.  I use mainly lore-safe immersive mods, so that is what my config supports.  Please let me know if you have any suggestions for new mods that would fit well this goal!

[size=16]Now with [color=yellow]c[/color][color=green]o[/color][color=blue]l[/color][color=purple]o[/color][color=red]r[/color][color=orange]![/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]
SkyRe\'s \"Cure Disease\" spell is listed under potions since its name is identical to a vanilla potion.  There is nothing I can do about this.

[b]Currently supported:[/b]
Dawnguard DLC
Hearthfire DLC (adds no applicable items)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16225]Apocalypse Spell Package[/url] 3.03
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27028]ARMONIZER[/url] 2.3
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2275]Balanced Magic[/url] 3.04
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Baldolier - Bags and Pouches[/url] 1.101
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26230]Better Sorting[/url] 2.06 - This is not the original version of the mod, this is a link to a fixed version to repair some defects in the original
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url] 1.1
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950]Convenient Horses[/url] 4.5
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16474]Deadly Dragons Armory[/url] 4.4
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13931]Dovahkiin Relaxes Too[/url] 1.5
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28287]Dragon Knight Armor[/url] 2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23625]Forgotten Magic[/url] 4.3
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163]Frostfall[/url] 2.0
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21120]Heavy Armory[/url] 1.3
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url] 6
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url] 1.3 (This should cover both Third Era and Jaysus)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727]Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection[/url] 4
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/url] 1.2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12689]MECR\'s Classic Nord Shields[/url] 2.5
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15122]Nicoroshi Creations[/url] 1.2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24015]Omegared99 Armor Compilation[/url] 3.6
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653]Project Flintlock[/url] 1.3
Skyrim Monster Mod 10 (I use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16411]lore-friendly replacer[/url] with it)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]Skyrim Redone (SkyRe)[/url] 0.99.22
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24015]WEAPONIZER[/url] 3.2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10902]Weapon Variants Expansion[/url] 1.2
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416]Wearable Lanterns[/url] 2.2a
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter is Coming - Cloaks[/url] 2.1b

Click the version number up top for a changelog.
author: Nimbulan
